content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-83 to -87)
Consists of following entities:
- 4 Burner mining drills positioned at (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), (41.0,-83.0), (41.0,-86.0)
- Wooden chests for coal collection at (34.5,-86.5), (36.5,-86.5), (39.5,-83.5), (40.5,-87.5)
- Burner inserters at (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5) transferring coal between components

### Iron/Copper Ore Mining Station at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) mining both iron and copper ore
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5) collecting the ore
- Burner inserter at (-26.5,-59.5) transferring ore
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0) for smelting
- Output chest at (-24.5,-58.5) collecting plates

### Iron Ore Mining Complex at position(x=-6 to -10, y=-57 to -60)
Consists of:
- 3 Burner mining drills at (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Collection chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Transport belt system connecting components
- Multiple burner inserters managing material flow

### Smelting Line at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Consists of:
- 4 Stone furnaces at (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input chests at (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters managing material flow

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=17.5 to 27.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Electric poles distributing power

ERROR TIPS

### Extraction errors
- Cannot extract from empty or non-existent chests
- Ensure the chest contains the requested items before attempting extraction
- Verify the chest exists at the specified location

### System efficiency issues
- Multiple burner mining drills are out of fuel - implement a fuel distribution system
- Some inserters are waiting for source items - ensure proper supply chain
- Some chests are full - implement better item management or increase downstream processing

### Fluid system issues
- Steam engine has no input liquid - ensure proper pipe connections
- Boiler is out of fuel - implement automated fuel feeding system

### Belt system optimization
- Multiple empty belt groups - ensure proper input/output connections
- Some belts may be disconnected or improperly aligned
